__cvmx_cmd_queue_all_state_t Struct Reference

#include <cvmx-cmd-queue.h>

Data Fields

__cvmx_cmd_queue_lock_t lock [(CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_END >> 16)*256]
__cvmx_cmd_queue_state_t state [(CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_END >> 16)*256]

Detailed Description

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

This structure contains the global state of all command queues. It is stored in a bootmem named block and shared by all applications running on Octeon. Tickets are stored in a different cache line that queue information to reduce the contention on the ll/sc used to get a ticket. If this is not the case, the update of queue state causes the ll/sc to fail quite often.
